thread.title: Kevin Durant's mother trolls Thunder fans with cupcake shirt
thread.title_full: Kevin Durant's mother trolls Thunder fans with cupcake shirt

author: Dan Sostek (daniel.sostek@performgroup.com)
title: Kevin Durant's mother trolls Thunder fans with cupcake shirt
text:
â Wanda Durant (@MamaDurant) February 13, 2017 
This post comes after Durant's mom was reportedly upset Â with how her son was treated in his former home, saying that some Thunder fans called her son derogatory names in front of her. 
"Cupcake" became a rallying cry against Durant following an Instagram post by Thunder star Russell Westbrook of a tray of cupcakes following Durant's announcement that he would leave Oklahoma City. Â A photo posted by Russell Westbrook (@russwest44) on Jul 4, 2016 at 10:40am PDT 
While it is impressive that Durant acquired a t-shirt, she missed a great opportunity to become a cupcake herself. Watch This
